This transmits revised IRM 11.3.26, Disclosure of Official Information, Wagering Tax Information.

IRM 11.3.26.1 - Revised the title to Program Scope and Objectives to properly reﬂect the information communicated in this subsection. Included important information to conform to the new internal and management control standards under the following titles:
a. IRM
, Background - Added background information on Disclosures of Wagering Tax Information. Information from prior section
was incorporated into this new subsection. b. IRM
, Authority - Added legal authorities governing Disclosures of Wagering Tax Information. c. IRM

d. IRM
, Acronyms - Compiled a list of frequently used abbreviations and their terms regarding Disclosures of Wagering Tax Information. e. IRM
, Related Resources - Added related resources applicable to the Disclosure of Wagering Tax Information process.
